tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Papua New Guinea is known for its immense cultural diversity, with over 800 languages spoken and distinct traditional practices.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: The country boasts stunning natural beauty, including tropical rainforests, volcanic landscapes, and diverse marine ecosystems.

tidbits.title: Challenges and Resilience
tidbits.description: Despite challenges, Papua New Guinea showcases resilience, rich artistic traditions, and a unique way of life in its remote communities.
